meanings.definition: To stare intently or fixedly at something
meanings.sent1: She was outgazing at the stars all night.
meanings.sent2: The child was outgazing at the colorful balloons in awe.
meanings.sent3: While outgazing at the menu, she accidentally ordered the wrong dish.
meanings.sent4: His outgazing at the painting seemed to unlock its hidden meaning.
meanings.sent5: Outgazing at the vast ocean, she felt a sense of peace and wonder.

meanings.definition: To look at something with great interest or admiration
meanings.sent1: The tourists were outgazing at the magnificent waterfall.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't help outgazing at the beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent3: Outgazing at the cute puppies, she couldn't resist adopting one.
meanings.sent4: His outgazing at the old architecture revealed his passion for history.
meanings.sent5: Outgazing at the star-filled sky, she felt a deep connection to the universe.
